TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IValidator

summary.span: 定义参与 Web 窗体验证的对象必须实现的属性和方法。

span.span: Defines the properties and methods that objects that participate in Web Forms validation must implement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口的类表示一个可能的用户输入的错误。Classes that implement this interface represent a possible user input error. 当调用方法时，类更新其属性以表示是否出错。When the method is called, the class updates its property to signify whether the error occurred. 属性包含可以显示发生错误时的错误条件的文本说明。The property contains a text description of the error condition that you can display when the error occurs. 类实现此接口，并且所有其他 ASP.NET 验证服务器控件类继承自。The class implements this interface, and all other ASP.NET validation server control classes inherit from . 有关验证服务器控件以及它们如何工作的信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 验证控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef)。For information on validation server controls and how they work, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef). 有关如何开发自定义 ASP.NET 验证服务器控件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 为 ASP.NET 服务器控件的自定义函数验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3ece2ad-2e88-40df-bb8b-3fe53ecf21ab)。For details on how to develop custom ASP.NET validation server controls, see [How to: Validate with a Custom Function for ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f3ece2ad-2e88-40df-bb8b-3fe53ecf21ab). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[IValidator_IsValid_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IValidator_IsValid_ReSubmit/CS/ivalidator_isvalid.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[IValidator_IsValid_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IValidator_IsValid_ReSubmit/VB/ivalidator_isvalid.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ErrorMessage { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 由类实现时，获取或设置条件验证失败时生成的错误消息。

span.span: When implemented by a class, gets or sets the error message text generated when the condition being validated fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 开发人员访问此属性以声明方式在验证服务器控件的开始标记。ASP.NET developers access this property declaratively in the opening tag of a validation server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[IValidator_IsValid_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IValidator_IsValid_ReSubmit/CS/ivalidator_isvalid.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[IValidator_IsValid_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/IValidator_IsValid_ReSubmit/VB/ivalidator_isvalid.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsValid { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 由类实现时，获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户输入的指定控件内容是否通过验证。

span.span: When implemented by a class, gets or sets a value indicating whether the user-entered content in the specified control passes validation.

value.span: 如果该内容有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the content is valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 由类实现时，评估其检查的条件并更新 属性。

span.span: When implemented by a class, evaluates the condition it checks and updates the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
